title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When attempting to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, the following error message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.' I would like to understand the meaning of this message.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g org.apache.ant), the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' is displayed.
EB:
When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects (e.g org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, instead, I see the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.

BTW, I would like to understand the meaning of this message.
SR:
- Open a binary project (e.g org.apache.ant).
- Try to view the scoped type hierarchy.
- Observe the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
